name: Choking Smoke
summary: When you cast fireball, you can modify it to create a cloud of smoking smoke.
description:
When you cast fireball heightened to at least 6th level, you can modify the spell's standard effects as follows: Reduce the spell's damage by 6d6. Your fireball leaves behind a lingering cloud of toxic smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of stinking cloud.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
